name: Fleets of Ascendancy
description: Meet allies, foes and aliens on your trek across a solar system. Plan layouts, coordinate attacks, balance resources, manage fleet facilities and take on many different kinds of enemies in numerous encounters along your journey.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i3 2.5Ghz or equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB GPU Storage: 120 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5 3Ghz or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2GB GPU Storage: 200 MB available space
